const botones = document.querySelectorAll('button'); var second = document.getElementById('sec'); var main = document.getElementById('main'); const Calcu = () => { return (
) } export default Calcu for (let i = 0; i < botones.length; i++) { const element = botones[i]; element.addEventListener('click', function() { element.value == "="? (second.value=main.value, main.value=eval(second.value)): element.value == "C"? (second.value="", main.value=""): element.value == "back"? main.value=main.value.substring(0,main.value.length-1): main.value=main.value + element.value; })};
